tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AnalysisResults (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    social_issue_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_result TEXT,
    analyst_name TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (social_issue_id) REFERENCES SocialIssues(id)
);

CREATE TABLE developer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    issue_id INT,
    developer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE social_issues_analysis (
  id INT,
  issue_title VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  location VARCHAR(100),
  created_at TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (id)
);

CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (
  trend_id INT,
  trend_name VARCHAR(100),
  analysis_result TEXT,
  analyzed_by VARCHAR(50),
  analyzed_at TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (trend_id)
);

CREATE TABLE strategic_planning (
  plan_id INT,
  plan_name VARCHAR(100),
  plan_description TEXT,
  planned_by VARCHAR(50),
  planned_at TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (plan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE interventions (
  intervention_id INT,
  intervention_name VARCHAR(100),
  intervention_description TEXT,
  implemented_by VARCHAR(50),
  implemented_at TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (intervention_id)
);

CREATE TABLE DeveloperAnalysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    developer_id INT NOT NULL,
    issue_id INT NOT NULL,
    analysis_date DATE,
    analysis_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE StrategicPlanning (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    strategy_description TEXT
);
